original_text: Because ye were glad, because ye rejoiced, O ye destroyers of mine heritage, because ye are grown fat as the heifer at grass, and bellow as bulls;
korean_text: 나의 소유를 노략하는 자여 너희가 즐거워하며 기뻐하고 타작하는 송아지 같이 발굽을 구르며 군마 같이 우는도다

sentences.original_text: O ye destroyers of mine heritage
because ye are grown fat as heifer at grass
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 풀에 있는 송아지처럼 살이 쪘기 때문이며
